item.title: Will the real scrapy please stand up
item.description: Scraping lyrics Title puns aside, Iâ€™ll be using the rvest package to scrape all Eminem song lyrics from here library(rvest) ## Loading required package: xml2 library(stringr) library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union url <- "https://www.azlyrics.com/e/eminem.html" html <- xml2::read_html(url) links_to_songs <- html %>% html_nodes(css = "#listAlbum a") length(links_to_songs) ## [1] 396 links_to_songs[length(links_to_songs)] ## {xml_nodeset (1)} ## [1] <a href=".
